{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = <!-- tagline --> |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none -->
|brand = Proxim |model = 8800-FC |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = PCMCIA (32-bit) |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = <!-- Connector Form Factor, Leave blank for none -->
|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0013 |subvendor_id = 14b7 |subdevice_id = aa30 |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = HZB-G11FNFPC, B94J8432A |icid = 1856A-G11FNFPC |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:20:A6
|chip1 = Atheros;AR5212; |chip2 = Atheros;AR5111; |chip3 = Atheros;AR2111; |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = MC |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b/g |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =
|is_manuf = No |manuf = Ambit Microsystems |manuf_model = U59H001.01 |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |flags = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |802dot11_protocols = bg |accessible_UART = |accessible_JTAG = |category =
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/18/2003 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00009OLMR |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This card was sold as a b/g upgrade kit for AP-2000s. Though it was never intended to be used as such, it works in Windows with Atheros' reference drivers (you must manually install and select a device).
It appears to have been manufactured by Ambit / Foxconn / Hon Hai (U59H001.01). Uses an uncommon combination of AR5212 + AR5111 + AR2111 for 802.11b/g only. .. and although it shares a great resemblance to the popular '''Proxim''' 'businessman' PC Cards, the receive sensitivity on this model seems to be notably lower.
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="Original"> File:Proxim_8800-FC_top.jpg| File:Proxim_8800-FC_bot.jpg| </gallery></center>[[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] <center> <gallery caption="Avaya rebranded (8800-FC-AV)"> File:Avaya_8800-FC-AV_top.jpg| File:Avaya_8800-FC-AV_bot.jpg| </gallery></center><!-- may want to move the Avaya rebrands to their own seperate page at some point -->
